required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Induction Method in Post Operative Agitation
clinical_study.official_title: the Effect of Two Different Method; Mask Ventilation or Intravenous Canulation on Emergence Agitation and Recovery Conditions on Pediatric Adenotonsillectomy

lead_sponsor.agency: Ahi Evran University Education and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Ahi Evran University Education and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: To compare the effect of two different induction method; mask ventilation and intravenous cannulation on emergence agitation on pediatric adenotonsillectomy

detailed_description.textblock: Many things cause emergence agitation after operations on pediatric population. This research aims determine which method, mask ventilation or intravenous cannulatin is more effective on emergence agitation

primary_outcome.measure: assess changing in pediatric agitation/ emergence delirium scale(PAED) scores
primary_outcome.description: to asses change of intensity of postoperative emergence agitation/ delirium (PAED) by using pediatric agitation emergence delirium scale with scores. to assess changing PAED scores at one hour after transfer into the post anesthesia care unit.

secondary_outcome.description: to asses postoperative pain intensity with scores by FLACC (face, legs,activity, cry, consolobility) scale after transfer into the post anesthesia care unit

arm_group.description: induction is made with mask ventilation
induction is made with intravenous cannulation

intervention.description: before intravenous induction, mask application is made. then intravenous cannulation and induction
induction is applied by using intravenous cannulation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- pediatric adenotonsillectomy
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with neurological, hepatic, renal disorders and using any drugs

overall_official.affiliation: Ahi Evran University Education and Research Hospital

facility.name: Dışkapı Yıldırım Beyazıt Education and research hospital
Ahi evran university education and research hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Ahi Evran University Education and Research Hospital
